displayName: Deny rule combinations within an NSG
description: This policy will deny the creation of NSG rules that are defined via this Policy. All parameters are optional in that if you want you could only detect on one field within an NSG. The source and destination address fields work by detecting if a rule would allow a non-rf1918 address, if so, then deny. The source and destination port field can even evaluate if a number is included in a range of numbers. Example, if you provided the value of 22, and tried to make an NSG rule where the destination port value was 20-200 this Policy would deny that creation. Additionally it will prevent a user from using '*' or 'Internet' in a rule as that would effectively violate the intent of this Policy.

metadata.displayName: Check for Inbound or Outbound rule
metadata.description: This specifies if you're looking for this port as part of an inbound or outbound rule
This specifies if you're looking for this port as part of an allow or deny rule

This defines whether or not this Policy will assess to see if someone has made a rule in the destination address field this is NOT an RFC1918 address. Allowed values are: 'Do Not Assess' or 'Deny'. If set to Deny a user will be unable to put a non RFC1918 address in their destination rule.

This defines whether or not this Policy will assess to see if someone has made a rule in the source address field this is NOT an RFC1918 address. Allowed values are: 'Do Not Assess' or 'Deny'. If set to Deny a user will be unable to put a non RFC1918 address in their source rule.

metadata.displayName: Destination Port to Block - 0 Disables Check
Source Port to Block - 0 Disables Check

allOf.value: [if(and(not(equals(parameters('destinationInternet'), 'Do Not Assess')), not(empty(field('Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/securityRules/destinationAddressPrefix')))), if(contains(createArray('1','2'), first(field('Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/securityRules/destinationAddressPrefix'))), if(if(not(equals(split(field('Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/securityRules/destinationAddressPrefix'), '.')[0], '10')), bool('true'), bool('false')), bool('true'), bool('false')), if(contains(createArray('Internet','*'), field('Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/securityRules/destinationAddressPrefix')), bool('true'), bool('false'))), bool('false'))]
